application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of details for condition 16 (Carbon reduction) of planning permission ref. HGY/2016/3482 for the demolition of existing building and redevelopment of site to provide 41 new homes within 3 buildings ranging from 3 to 6 storeys in height, with associated vehicular access from Woodside Avenue, wheelchair parking, landscaping, refuse/recycling and cycle storage facilities and as amended by ref. HGY/2021/1031 on 14/07/2021 for various changes to the external appearance and internal layout, revised landscaping and amendments to Conditions 16 (Energy Strategy) and 20 (Renewable Energy).
site_name: Coppetts Wood Hospital, Coppetts Road, Hornsey, London, N10 1JN
